Package ru.tinkoff.qa.neptune.core.api.localization

Interface StepLocalization

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocalizationByResourceBundle
    public interface StepLocalization
    Interface to translate step parameter and description.

        Makes a translation
        Type Parameters:
        T - is a type of a given objec
        Parameters:
        object - is an object which may be used for auxiliary purposes
        method - is a method which may be used for auxiliary purposes
        args - objects which may be used for auxiliary purposes

      • classTranslation

        <T> java.lang.String classTranslation​(java.lang.Class<T> clz,
                                      java.lang.String description,
                                      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> descriptionTemplateParams,
                                      java.util.Locale locale)
        Makes translation by usage of a class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - is a type of a class
        Parameters:
        clz - is a class whose metadata may be used for auxiliary purposes
        description - is a description of a step. It is fully completed by value taken from Description of a class and by values which are taken from fields annotated by DescriptionFragment
        descriptionTemplateParams - is a map of parameters and their values. These parameters are taken from fields annotated by DescriptionFragment. This parameter is included because the map is possible to be re-used for some reasons.
        locale - is a used locale
        Returns:
        translated text

      • methodTranslation

        java.lang.String methodTranslation​(java.lang.reflect.Method method,
                                   java.lang.String description,
                                   java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> descriptionTemplateParams,
                                   java.util.Locale locale)
        Makes translation by usage of a method.
        Parameters:
        method - is a method whose metadata may be used for auxiliary purposes
        description - is a description of a step. It is fully completed by value taken from Description of a method and by values which are taken from method parameters annotated by DescriptionFragment
        descriptionTemplateParams - is a map of parameters and their values. These parameters are taken from method parameters annotated by DescriptionFragment.This parameter is included because the map is possible to be re-used for some reasons.
        locale - is a used locale
        Returns:
        translated text

      • memberTranslation

        <T extends java.lang.reflect.AnnotatedElement & java.lang.reflect.Member> java.lang.String memberTranslation​(T member,
                                                                                                             java.lang.String description,
                                                                                                             java.util.Locale locale)
        Makes translation by usage of other annotated element that differs from Class and Method
        Type Parameters:
        T - is a type of a member
        Parameters:
        member - is an annotated element whose metadata may be used for auxiliary purposes
        description - is a description taken from the member
        locale - is a used locale
        Returns:
        translated text

      • translation

        java.lang.String translation​(java.lang.String text,
                             java.util.Locale locale)
        Makes translation of a text.
        Parameters:
        text - to be translated
        locale - is a used locale
        Returns:
        translated text
